item.title: Introduction
item.description: The Beacon SDK is a toolset designed to enhance and streamline the development of virtual tabletop (VTT) character sheets and other interactive elements.

item.title: Installing Beacon
item.description: This installation guide is designed for sheet developers with experience in web development, that want to start creating a character sheet from scratch or already have an existing project they wish to add Beacon to.

item.title: Quick Start Sheet Template
item.description: Prerequisites To set this sheet up properly, make sure that you have the following tools installed: Vue.js Vite SCSS Figure 1: Quickstart sheet

item.title: Example Patterns Sheet
item.description: Prerequisites To set this sheet up properly, make sure that you have the following: Vue framework & Routing Multiple Data Stores Complex Roll Templates Rich Sheet Actions TypeScript Vite SCSS Ability to run Unit & End-to-End Tests Figure 1: Advanced sheet

item.title: Releasing a Sheet
item.description: A release sheet is a finalized version of a character sheet or other content designed for use on the Roll20 platform.
